actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii certain physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort DeRussy, Hawaii, for the establishment of a mental health clinic in such facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii such physical facilities at Fort DeRussy, Hawaii, which are determined not to be needed by the Army and which are adequate for the operation of a mental health facility.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii certain physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort DeRussy, Hawaii, for the establishment of a mental health clinic in such facilities.
